projectGridLines.title: 1. Pan-India Business Development  &  Role-2 - International Business Development Associate
projectGridLines.description:
Pan-India Business Development

Role - Business Development Associate

Identify and drive new business opportunities across India by developing strategic relationships

with real estate developers and stakeholders. You will introduce Convrse Spaces' cutting-edge

immersive tech solutions, including VR/AR experiences, interactive sales tools, and phygital

centers, to prospective clients. Craft tailored business proposals, negotiate deals, and

implement sales strategies to scale Convrse Spaces' presence across key markets in India.

International Outreach & Business Development

Role - International Business Development Associate

Expand Convrse Spaces' footprint into global markets by identifying and targeting international

real estate developers and potential partners. Develop a strong network of global clients,

building relationships that align with our vision of transforming real estate sales through

immersive technologies. You will lead market entry strategies, craft international partnerships,

and manage global outreach initiatives to showcase our innovative tech solutions.

If you're a talented and motivated individual who thrives in a dynamic environment, we

encourage you to apply.
